name: GeoRace
description:
GeoRace is an obstacle course game where you must reach the finish line in the shortest time possible without losing lives. Use your skills to reach the shortest time possible through the 9 levels. 


Controls:

WASD / ARROW KEYS – Camera movement

SPACE BAR – Dash

L-SHIFT – Speed boost

Q – Freeze time

R – Restart level

ESC – Menu


DevLog

The project is based on the fantastic GameDev.tv (Unity Game Developer 3D) course. With everything I learned, I decided to create a minigame of 9 levels to expand my knowledge by adding new mechanics and a funny cartoon aesthetic to it. I hope you enjoy it!
